alert.note: Alert for Clay; Daviess; Greene; Owen; Sullivan; Vigo (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 9:34AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Vigo, Sullivan, southwestern Clay, southwestern Owen and Greene Counties through 1000 AM EDT... At 933 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles south of Terre Haute to 6 miles east of Palestine. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Spencer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Daviess; Greene; Owen; Sullivan; Vigo
